review_title: Overall a good place to start your career and learn a lot, but get out as soon as possible because its like a marsh
pros: Very good learning experience, people are very friendly, the client are very good, independence and authority to work
cons: your career stagnates after a point and you really want to get out because you do not see any growth whatsoever.
